title: The New Great Depression - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/14/21
itunes:title: The New Great Depression - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/14/21
description:
George Noory and author Jim Rickards explore his research into the weakened world economy due to the COVID-19 pandemic, how safe commodities like gold or Bitcoin could still be risky, and what to do to protect your savings.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
